The body offered up to cruelty
To the lash which whips on the skin
Which slashes the flesh, lacerates the back”
-Samael, “Flagellation”}} ==Useful Info== '''Lasher statues''' are aggressive [[whip]]-wielding [[statue]]s which lash out at anything which comes within range. Their weapons are often [[brand]]ed, and they are usually positioned somewhere that is difficult to engage them at range. However, once you move away from them, they are harmless. They can be found defending the treasure vault in the [[Volcano]]. ==Tips & Tricks== *When you find yourself low on [[HP]], just walk away and heal; the statues won't flee or regenerate during this time. ==History== *Prior to [[0.19]], they could be found in a [[Volcano]] layout.
